request.schema: [{"name":"external_id","label":"External ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Booking identifier (UUID)"},{"name":"guest_email","label":"Guest email","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest email address (resolves to contact_id for changing guest)"},{"name":"room_number","label":"Room number","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Hotel room number (resolves to room_id for changing room)"},{"name":"check_in_date","label":"Check-in date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":true,"hint":"Guest arrival date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"check_out_date","label":"Check-out date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":true,"hint":"Guest departure date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"number_of_guests","label":"Number of guests","type":"number","control_type":"number","optional":true,"hint":"Total guests in party"},{"name":"special_requests","label":"Special requests","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest requests or notes"}]
